Title: Requires that the same educational requirements shall apply for students who require nursing services as for general education students
Summary: Requires that the same educational requirements shall apply for students who require nursing services as for general education students; provides that nursing services may be delivered to students with disabilities through electronic communication or a virtual or online platform or in the home of the student.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to virtual or remote instruction days for public schools and private schools for students who require nursing services
